word_mean: 配位子，配体：能提供必要电子与金属离子形成配位共价键的有机分子，如氧分子结合到血红蛋白的中央铁原子。此词也表示与另一分子起反应而生成某个复合物的任何离子或分子。复合物常为一个大分子，如抗原-抗体复合物

sentence.Network_en: Macromolecules cannot approach the ligand owing to steric hindrance of the matrix.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于载体的立体位阻的关系,大分子化合物不能接触到配基.

sentence.Network_en: It is occasionally necessary to use a number system to designate the position of each ligand.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时需要用一种编号系统来标明各配体的位置.

sentence.Network_en: This problem may be conveniently resolved by placing an " arm " between the matrix and ligand.
sentence.Network_cn: 在载体与配基之间接上一只 “ 手臂 ”,这个问题就容易解决了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: from Latin ligandus 'that can be tied', gerundive of ligare 'to bind'

means.word_mean: 1. an atom or molecule or radical or ion that forms a complex around a central atom
